snippet.title: PICO PARK 2 – Launch trailer – Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
PICO PARK 2 is available today on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/pico-park-2-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01
 
PICO PARK 2 is a 2D action-puzzle game where working together is key. Play with 2-8 players locally or online. Up to 7 players can join online with a single Nintendo Switch! All levels can be played no matter how many players you have. Discover more levels and a new (kind of) unfair and difficult DARK MODE!
 
#PICOPARK2 #IndieWorld #NintendoSwitch

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
